backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Gadget Galaxy backend, implementing product catalog management, user profile management, order submission/retrieval, and Stripe payment integration with role-based access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that fixes faulty product records by replacing empty descriptions, placeholder names, or sentinel stock values with corrected defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three product catalog features (data loading, image rendering, add-to-cart) to their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary document describing the purpose and key changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind directives and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Gadget Galaxy React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing cart state, multi-view navigation (catalog, checkout, order history, payment flows, admin), and providing QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin-only panel for managing the product catalog with a table view and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting products, gated by admin role checks.
frontend/src/components/CartPanel.tsx: A slide-in drawer component displaying cart items with quantity controls, remove buttons, and a checkout action. Includes a helper function that maps product names to local fallback images.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutFlow.tsx: Handles the checkout process by either redirecting to a Stripe Checkout session or submitting the order directly, with Internet Identity authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with brand logo, nav links (Home, Products, My Orders, Admin Panel), cart icon with count badge, and Internet Identity login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero section with a headline, tagline, and two call-to-action buttons linking to the products section.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistory.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's past orders fetched from the backend, with loading skeletons, error handling, and product name resolution via a product map.
frontend/src/components/OrderSuccess.tsx: Success confirmation screen shown after an order is placed, displaying the order ID and buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Displays a payment cancellation screen with a failure icon and two action buttons allowing the user to retry payment or continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSetup.tsx: Admin-only floating button and dialog for configuring Stripe payments by entering a secret key and managing allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Handles post-payment flow by verifying the Stripe session, submitting the order to the backend, and displaying success, loading, or error states.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Renders a filterable, sortable product grid with category filters, search, and cart integration, using local fallback images mapped by product name and category.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Shows a modal dialog prompting newly authenticated users to enter their display name, saving it via the backend profile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, admin checks, products (CRUD), orders, and Stripe configuration using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including teal brand colors and shadcn UI variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Inter font, teal brand colors in oklch, shadcn UI color tokens, custom border radius, accordion animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Gadget Galaxy e-commerce app, tracking existing features (ProductCatalog data loading, images, add-to-cart) and pending fix requests to make the product page functional.
